title: China Is Burning More Coal, a Growing Climate Challenge
description: The country’s emissions of greenhouse gases rose last year at the fastest pace in a decade. Beijing is looking for alternatives.
dc:creator: Keith Bradsher and Clifford Krauss
media:credit: Gilles Sabrié for The New York Times
media:description: A coal-fired power plant in Beijing. China has long viewed coal, which it has in abundance, as the best way to avoid becoming overly dependent on foreign energy suppliers.
